title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can login successfully with correct credentials and is redirected to the dashboard with appropriate permissions.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard
Verify user permissions are correctly applied for role-based access

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login is denied with invalid username/email or password and proper error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Verify login is rejected
Verify error message is displayed explaining invalid credentials

title: Admin Setup Initial Configuration
description: Verify initial admin setup process allows superuser creation and configuration of application settings.

steps.description: Launch application for first time with empty database
Complete admin setup form with required information and password
Submit admin setup form
Verify superuser account is created
Verify application redirects to main dashboard

title: Dashboard Real-Time Statistics Display
description: Verify that the dashboard loads and displays real-time statistics, charts, and activity feeds with up-to-date data.

steps.description: Login as a user with dashboard access
Navigate to main dashboard page
Verify statistics cards display accurate data according to recent data
Verify charts render correctly reflecting transactions over time
Verify activity feed shows recent user activities

title: Client CRUD Operations with History Tracking
description: Verify full Create, Read, Update, Delete operations on clients with history logs recorded for each action.

steps.description: Login with permissions for client management
Create a new client with valid data
Verify new client is saved and visible in client list
Update client details
Verify client details are updated accordingly
View client history modal
Verify history log shows creation and update events with correct timestamps
Delete the client
Verify client is removed from client list and deletion is recorded in history

title: CSV Import for Clients with Validation and Duplicate Detection
description: Verify CSV import functionality for clients correctly validates data, prevents duplicates, and reports errors.

steps.description: Navigate to client import page
Upload a well-formed CSV file with valid client data
Verify clients are imported successfully
Upload CSV with client entries that already exist
Verify duplicates are detected and import process alerts user without importing duplicates
Upload CSV with invalid data entries
Verify validation errors are reported with detailed messages

title: Transaction Management with Multi-Currency Support and Filtering
description: Verify creation, update, deletion, and filtering of transactions in USD, CDF and CNY currencies with validation and locking of 'Servi' status transactions.

steps.description: Create a transaction with valid data in USD
Verify the transaction is saved and displayed correctly
Create transactions in CDF and CNY
Verify transactions reflect correct currency values
Set a transaction status to 'Servi'
Attempt to modify or delete the 'Servi' transaction
Verify modification and deletion are blocked with appropriate message
Apply filters on transaction list by currency, status, date
Verify transaction list reflects filtering criteria accurately

title: Invoice and Quotation Creation with Auto-Numbering and PDF Export
description: Verify creating invoices and quotations with multiple line items, automatic transport fee calculation, strict unique auto-incrementing daily numbering, and exporting generated PDF correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to create new invoice/quotation page
Add multiple line items with quantities and prices
Verify transport fees are auto-calculated correctly
Save invoice/quotation
Verify invoice/quotation number follows unique auto-incrementing daily format
Export invoice/quotation as PDF
Verify PDF contains correct details matching the invoice
Convert quotation to invoice
Verify quotation status updates and invoice is created with correct numbering

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement and Row-Level Security
description: Verify that all CRUD operations and data views are restricted according to user roles and permissions with row-level security properly applied.

steps.description: Login as a user with limited role permissions
Attempt to access client, transaction, invoice management screens
Verify access is denied or restricted per role permissions
Attempt to perform CRUD operations beyond permitted scope
Verify operations are blocked or fail with authorization error
Verify data listings show only permitted data rows (row-level security)

title: Activity Logging with Detailed Audit Trail and Notification Center
description: Verify that all critical user actions across the application are logged with timestamp, user details, and affected entities; verify filtering and notification center functionality.

steps.description: Perform client, transaction, and invoice operations by various users
Navigate to activity logging page
Verify all user actions are recorded with accurate timestamps and details
Apply filters by user, action type, and date
Verify filtered results are accurate
Check notification center for recent activity alerts
Verify notifications correspond to recorded activities and display correctly

title: Settings Management for Company Info, Exchange Rates, and User Permissions
description: Verify that administrators can update company information, manage exchange rates accurately, and configure user roles and permissions with immediate effect.

steps.description: Login as an administrator
Navigate to settings page
Update company info fields and save
Verify updated company info is persisted
Add or edit exchange rates with valid values
Verify exchange rates update is saved and reflected in transactions
Modify user permissions by adding/removing roles
Verify changes apply immediately and access is updated accordingly

title: Bulk Operations for Clients and Transactions
description: Verify bulk actions including export, deletion, and status updates function properly with confirmation prompts and permission checks.

steps.description: Select multiple clients for bulk export
Trigger bulk export
Verify export file is generated and contains correct data
Select multiple transactions for bulk status update
Change status of selected transactions
Verify statuses update correctly and 'Servi' transaction restrictions are enforced
Select multiple clients for bulk deletion
Confirm bulk deletion
Verify selected clients are deleted and logged

title: Form Validation for Client and Transaction Inputs
description: Verify client and transaction forms enforce react-hook-form and Zod schema validations both client-side and server-side for all required fields, formats and constraints.

steps.description: Open client creation form
Submit form with missing required fields
Verify validation errors appear on required fields
Submit form with invalid input formats (e.g. incorrect email, phone)
Verify validation error messages appear for format violations
Submit valid form data
Verify data is accepted and saved
Repeat tests for transaction creation/edit forms

title: Responsive UI and Reusable Components Verification
description: Verify UI displays correctly on multiple screen sizes using Shadcn UI and Radix UI components and that reusable components behave consistently across features.

steps.description: Navigate through different pages on desktop viewport
Verify UI elements align correctly and are fully functional
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile resolutions
Verify responsive layout adjustments and usability of UI components
Verify dialogs, buttons, tables and form inputs behave consistently

title: Real-Time Data Refresh and Caching on Dashboard
description: Verify dashboard data updates reflect in real-time with TanStack Query caching and efficient pagination when new client or transaction data changes.

steps.description: Load dashboard data and note current statistics
Create new client or transaction in a separate session
Verify dashboard reflects updated data without full page refresh
Scroll through paginated lists for transactions or activities
Verify pagination loads data efficiently without delays or errors
